title: Lean, Clean, and In-Between
content: For release on delivery  4:30 p.m. EDT  October 18, 2013    Lean, Clean, and In-Between         Remarks by   Jeremy C. Stein   Member   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   at the   National Bureau of Economic Research Conference:    Lessons from the Financial Crisis for Monetary Policy   Boston        October 18, 2013
